amendment.description: To provide emergency food aid for HIV/AIDS victims.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1198 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1198 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9206, S9214-9215; text: CR S9206) To provide emergency food aid for HIV/AIDS victims.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1198 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1198 proposed by Senator Lugar for Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 1136.
